trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Eaton Rapids
There were no other sightings in Eaton Rapids on or around July 25th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsi saw two starlike light with no sound,one traveling from the left of me in the sky,the other one was coming from the left of the sky.I though they were goin to meet in the sky but the one on the left of the sky went behind the treeline and i though it would come out but didnt.The light on the right just stopped and is still hovering inthe sky bobbing around.Ive seen these since i was a kid.It was scary to me then but now im curious instead of scared.Its still there right now hovering and bobbing around.I have no video camera or phone with a camera.I wish i did right now..
Summary: one was coming from the left of the sky,one was coming from the right of the sky....one dissapeared behind treetop the other one is still there hovering and bobbing around
